entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 06:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:22 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 06:22 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 06:22 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
